description: Displays all critical metrics required to monitor when flash drive is configured for either sindex or index

panels.description:
Displays Average objects per sprig in each Namespace, formula is: (master_objects/4096) / partition_tree_sprigs.
partition_tree_springs default value is 256
panels.title: Average Objects per Sprig (Primary Index) - $namespace

targets.expr:
sum (aerospike_latencies_write_ms_bucket{cluster_name=~"$cluster", ns="$namespace", le="+Inf"})
- 
sum (aerospike_latencies_write_ms_bucket{cluster_name=~"$cluster", ns="$namespace",  le="4"})

sum (aerospike_latencies_read_ms_bucket{cluster_name=~"$cluster", ns="$namespace", le="+Inf",}) 
- 
sum (aerospike_latencies_read_ms_bucket{cluster_name=~"$cluster", ns="$namespace", le="4",})

panels.description:
Represents how much used memory is consumed against the High Water Memory configured, the lower it is the better,
NOTE: no data will be shown if High Water Pct is not configured.
panels.title: Used Memory Pct vs High Water Mark Pct

panels.description: Represents how much used memory is consumed against the High Water Memory configured, the lower it is the better
panels.title: Used Memory Pct vs High Water Mark Pct

targets.expr:
(
    (aerospike_latencies_write_ms_bucket{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^", le="+Inf"})
    - ignoring (le)
    (aerospike_latencies_write_ms_bucket{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^", le="$latency_time_bucket"})
)

title: All Flash
